To use the analysis data (support) from my machines (optibench, neonoven, ...) I need another adjusted research module.
The module has to be connected directly to the researcher (standing next to it) to be able to function, whereby the actual work is performed in the researcher itself.

The module saves up to 512 SP. If this isn't enough (check specifications in the blueprints), I have to connect several modules of that kind with the researcher. The support points are transportable by batteries in the module.
